A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I were more surprised at the divide of the audience scoring\, but I'm not.  STAR WARS: The Last Jedi is a Good Movie.  Thought provoking\, and underneath the fierce action and spectacular scenery - it's sad.  Really sad.  And... it does what real life would do with the sort-of constant tragedy: It just drives on.  And\, as all good movies\, do - it does unexpected things.  Surprising things.  And weirdly\, I think fan boys hate surprises.  Because they apparently would rather show off their opposition to anything they didn't think up themselves\, than allow for a story they didn't think of to unfold.  Anyway:  Really really really go see this movie.  It's really good and really brave.  Don't let someone else's burnt sense of irony joyrob you from this film.
